text: Search this document: This document describes the Legacy Desktop Client used for all versions of MediationZone prior to 9.0.0. The Legacy Desktop is still required for certain functionality that is currently not available in the regular Desktop and includes: ECS Inspector , see the documentation for Error Correction System for more information ECS Statistics , see the documentation for Error Correction System for more information SNMP Collection Agents Configuration Diff Disk Agents in Real-Time Workflows Subfolders, see Legacy Desktop User Interface for more information Chapters The following chapters and sections are included: Installation and Configuration of Legacy Desktop Legacy Desktop Overview Pico Viewer Disk Agents in Real-Time Workflows Configuration Diff Documentation Generator System Monitor
title: Legacy Desktop - MediationZone Documentation 9.3 - InfoZone
